com.parrot.arsdk.arnetwork

Class ARNetworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parrot.arsdk.arnetwork.ARNetworkManager

  • public abstract class ARNetworkManager
extends Object
    Network manager allow to send and receive data acknowledged or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ARNetworkManager

        public ARNetworkManager(ARNetworkALManager osSpecificManager,
                ARNetworkIOBufferParam[] inputParamArray,
                ARNetworkIOBufferParam[] outputParamArray,
                int timeBetweenPingsMs)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        osSpecificManager - The ARNetworkALManager to use. Must be initialized and valid
        inputParamArray - array of the parameters of the input buffers
        outputParamArray - array of the parameters of the output buffers
        timeBetweenPingsMs - Minimum time between two pings. A negative value means "no pings", Zero means "use default value"

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the threads of sending and reception
        Used to kill the threads calling ARNETWORK_Manager_SendingThreadRun() and ARNETWORK_Manager_ReceivingThreadRun().

      • readDataWithTimeout

        public ARNETWORK_ERROR_ENUM readDataWithTimeout(int outputBufferID,
                                       ARNativeData data,
                                       int timeoutMs)
        Read data received with timeout
        Parameters:
        outputBufferID - identifier of the output buffer in which the data must be read
        data - Data where store the reading
        timeoutMs - maximum time in millisecond to wait if there is no data to read
        Returns:
        error ARNETWORK_ERROR_ENUM type

                                                ARNETWORK_MANAGER_CALLBACK_STATUS_ENUM status,
                                                Object customData)
        CallBack for the status of the data sent or free
        Parameters:
        IoBufferId - identifier of the IoBuffer is calling back
        data - data sent
        status - reason of the callback
        customData - custom data
        Returns:
        ARNETWORK_MANAGER_CALLBACK_RETURN_ENUM what do in timeout case
